New Records: Trent Boult picked 3 wickets in the first powerplay against Sri Lanka, a feat he had achieved in his last 8 matches
Key Match Events: Trent Boult removed half of the Sri Lankan team in the opening powerplay
Kusal Perera brought up his half century in just 22 balls, but was dismissed by Lockie Ferguson
Sri Lanka lost 5 wickets inside the first 10 overs
Miscellaneous Highlights: Boult made the best use of overcast conditions to pick up three quick wickets against the Sri Lanka top-order
The New Zealand pacer, who returned to the ODI fold just before the World Cup 2023, finally found his form in the powerplay
